data.title: Hattie Butterworth on LinkedIn: Leah Broad ‘s review of Errollyn Wallen’s book ‘Becoming A Composer’ is…
data.meta_description:
Leah Broad ‘s review of Errollyn Wallen’s book ‘Becoming A Composer’ is out today!

Any opportunity to advocate for this wonderful woman and her *vital* book I…
data.text:
Aryn O'Donnell is VP of Corporate Services at Fieldwork, known by many to be one of the most trustworthy and engaged #qualitativeresearch partners in the #mrx industry. But what many people don’t know about Aryn is that the first paycheck she ever drew was for a role she played in #musicaltheater. Aryn and I discuss her theater days, the value of backroom focus group interactions and how #AI frees people up do what they do best. We also discuss her recent appreciation for the world of metal music \m/ Watch below or find+sub to the Rock n' Roll Research Podcast wherever you get your podcasts. [If you are in Dallas for the Quirk's Media Event this month, come check out the new Fieldwork Dallas facility on February 29th at the Insights Association - South Central Chapter “Leaping for Insights” happy hour event! Link in the comments.] #facetofacemrx ##newfoundglory #brandicarlile #foxyshazam #kelloggmba

🚀 Brace yourself for the sonic saga of Cookie$, the maestro on a mission! From Sunday hymns to drumming dynamo, Job’s story of his rise to rap royalty, had beats and blessings. Atlanta slammed the brakes on his musical road, but hey, detours are just life’s way of spicing up the journey! Amidst professional plot twists, a fresh musical genre blossomed. Takeaway tunes: 📖 Make learning your favourite jam 💃🏻 Dance with destiny’s remix 🕺🏻 Groove to the beat of universal knowledge Head over to BSA’s Finding Mojo Podcast on Spotify where the full episode is waiting to drop beats of wisdom and revelation. Watch the Full Episode here > https://lnkd.in/gkG_NpP3 #BSASolutions #FindingMojo #Cookie$ #rapmusic #podcast
